white.pawn.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
  make :moveset [ [ "Up ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

black.pawn.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Down ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

pawn.checkPromotion:
to checkPromotion [ :piece ] [
    make :dz objdz :piece
    if hasclass :dz "endzone [
        putclass "queen :piece
    removeclass "pawn :piece
    ifelse hasclass :piece "black [
            setobjimg :piece "BlackQueen.png
  sethl :piece "BlackQueenSelected.png      ] [
            setobjimg :piece "WhiteQueen.png
  sethl :piece "WhiteQueenSelected.png       ]
    ]
]

rook.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Down ] [ "Up ] [ "Left ] [ "Right ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailables :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

knight.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Down "DownRight ] [ "Down "DownLeft ] [ "Up "UpRight ] [ "Up "UpLeft ] [ "Left "UpLeft ] [ "Left "DownLeft ] [ "Right "UpRight ] [ "Right "DownRight ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

bishop.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "DownRight ] [ "DownLeft ] [ "UpRight ] [ "UpLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailables :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

queen.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Down ] [ "Up ] [ "Left ] [ "Right ] [ "DownRight ] [ "DownLeft ] [ "UpRight ] [ "UpLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailables :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

king.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Down ] [ "Up ] [ "Left ] [ "Right ] [ "DownRight ] [ "DownLeft ] [ "UpRight ] [ "UpLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailables :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]
